content: अपाश्रय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Without support or refuge, helpless. --यः {@--1@} Refuge, recourse, that to which recourse is had for refuge; कर्णे कृतापाश्रयः <ls>Ve. 5. 1.</ls> {@--2@} An awning or canopy spread over a courtyard. {@--3@} Head; त्वदंकापाश्रयां तां <ls>Dk. 34</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">69.</ls>
